content: Yes, exactly! It adds a layer of intrigue to the Fissionator's design and backstory. Perhaps the protective suit was designed specifically to withstand high levels of radiation, but it was never intended to be worn for extended periods of time. This would explain why the suit ultimately fused to the host's flesh and why the parasite was unable to escape on its own. Additionally, the Fissionator's movements could be slow and lumbering due to the weight of the suit and the parasite's influence over the host's movements.
